info.title: Veem API
info.description: A sample API that uses a petstore as an example to demonstrate features in the swagger-2.0 specification

get.description: Returns a list of countries supported and currencies for each

401.description: Unauthorized, the token is invalid or expired

500.description: Internal Server Error, see the error code and API doc for reference

403.description: Forbidden, the token owner doesn't have permission to operate current API

businessName.description: Business name or First Name Last Name of receiver

countryCode.description: The 2 letter ISO country codes,ISO Alpha-2

attachments.description: The list of external invoices to be attached with payment. The files can be uploaded using"file upload apis

ccEmails.description: The list of emails who will be notified about the payment

exchangeRateQuoteId.description: The quote id that was received earlier for the payment

externalInvoiceRefId.description: The external invoice if for which payment is made, viewable by receiver

notes.description: The memo/note associated with payment, viewable by receiver

payeeAmount.description: The receiving amount and currency of the payment

purposeOfPayment.description: The purpose of payment required by banks for certain countries, applicable for following countries.SG,AE,KR,BR,CN,HK,HR,IS,ID,IN,IL,KE,PK,SA,ZA,TW,UA,VN

fileReference.description: The file reference id received from Veem after file upload is complete

name.description: The name of the file (including the extension)

fromAmount.description: The source amount, either `from` or `to` amount is allowed, the other one is calculated

recipientAccountEmail.description: The email of recipient to get discounted rate

toAmount.description: The target amount, either `from` or `to` amount is allowed, the other one is calculated

toCountry.description: The destination country to ensure Veem can support transfer to

expiry.description: The expiry time of the current rate quote

fromAmount.description: The source amount, either from or to amount is allowed, the other one is calculated

rate.description: The Veem exchange rate for current transfer

toAmount.description: The target amount, either from or to amount is allowed, the other one is calculated

attachments.description: The list of external invoices to be attached with payment. The files can be uploaded using"file upload apis

ccEmails.description: The list of emails who will be notified about the payment

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate used associated with the payment

exchangeRateQuoteId.description: The quote id that was received earlier for the payment

externalInvoiceRefId.description: The external invoice if for which payment is made, viewable by receiver

notes.description: The memo/note associated with payment, viewable by receiver

payeeAmount.description: The receiving amount and currency of the payment

purposeOfPayment.description: The purpose of payment required by banks for certain countries, applicable for following countries.SG,AE,KR,BR,CN,HK,HR,IS,ID,IN,IL,KE,PK,SA,ZA,TW,UA,VN

timeCreated.description: The creation time of the payment. The format would be UTC, ISO-8601
